summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection record showing Jeffrey Epstein's passport information, including issuance and expiration dates, confirming his identity and travel document status as of April 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the passport record, showing his personal information and passport issuance details.

events.title: Epstein passport issued
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's U.S. passport was issued by the United States.

events.title: Epstein passport expiration
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's U.S. passport was set to expire.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein held a valid U.S. passport issued on May 31, 2016, set to expire on May 30, 2020.
The passport record was generated by U.S. Customs and Border Protection on April 26, 2019.
Epstein's date of birth is confirmed as January 20, 1953, and he was a male U.S. national.
